original_title: Banda Calypso: Ao Vivo No Olympia
overview: On November 25, 2005, the brazilian band "Banda Calypso" arrived for the first time at Olympia, one of the most popular concert halls  in São Paulo. The entire show was recorded on video and audio, for future promotional release, but was shelved. It was only in 2022 that fans finally had access to the much-requested  show that shows the band at their best and most successful era, full of hits.
title: Banda Calypso: Ao Vivo No Olympia
